dataStructure.name: sid.org.tmforum.tip.customer.bcoll.dunning.DunningRule
dataStructure.description:
A DunningRule is a type of PolicyRule. It represents rules to apply to a dunning case: the events that trigger dunning rules evaluation, the conditions to evaluate and the actions that must be done (Ex: SMS, letters, outbound calls, barring/unbarring actions, late fees, penalties)

This entity is optional
dataStructure.label: DunningRule

child.name: dunningCaseRule
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has multiplicity *

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association DunningRuleIsDoneInAccordanceTo

This association end is optional
child.label: dunningCaseRule

child.name: dunningScenario
child.description:
This element is generated from an association end.

This association end has aggregation none

This association end is navigable

This association end is unique

This association end is an end of association DunningScenarioContains

This association end is optional
child.label: dunningScenario
